"『ランクマッチで使用できる武器』について":
"Currently, you can use the five following types of weapon in Ranked Matches:

\u3000・Partizan (new)
\u3000・Twin Machinegun (new)
\u3000・Rod
\u3000・Bullet Bow
\u3000・Jet Boots

For details on each weapon, you can find out more by talking to Lavernat and selecting \"About Weapon Details\"."
